[[Image:Silver medal icon.svg]] [[1996 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|1996]], [[2002 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|2002]], [[2007 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|2007]]
[[Image:Bronze medal icon.svg]] [[1994 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|1994]], [[2000 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|2000]], [[2008 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|2008]], [[FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship 2009|2009]], [[2010 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship|2010]] |h_pattern_b=_thinsidesonwhite|h_body=DD0000|h_shorts=DD0000|h_pattern_s=_blanksides2 |a_pattern_b=_thinyellowsides|a_body=DD0000|a_shorts=DD0000|a_pattern_s=_yellowsides }} The '''Spain national U-20 basketball team''' ''(Spain Young national basketball team)'', is the representative for [[Spain]] in international [[basketball]] competitions, and it is organized and run by the [[Spanish Basketball Federation]]. The '''Spain national U-20 basketball team''' represents Spain at the [[FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship]], where they are the current reigning champions. ==FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship== {|
